website_summaries.verdict: You'll love sitting on this luxuriously soft cover as much as your pet does.
pros: Velvety fabric is ultra-soft and comes in 5 different colors
Cover is thick and comfortable to sit on
Heavy fabric hangs generously over the back of furniture to keep cover in place
Can go in the washing machine and dryer
cons: Cover does not work well on leather furniture

customer_reviews.title: Finally- no slip slidy
customer_reviews.text: Returned another manufacturer's cover and ordered this one. You should do the same-- if you only want to spend $30 or so on a cover don't expect it to be soft, warm and most importantly STAY IN PLACE-- This one is warm, soft and STAYS IN PLACE-- Lesson-- you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Sgd

customer_reviews.title: Sorry Dogs. We're Keeping This Sofa Intact.
customer_reviews.text: We're pleased that our new sofa is relatively safe from dog hair and dirty paws. The cover is comfortable, stays tucked-in (unless my husband is laying on the sofa watching football) and not unattractive. I take it off when we entertain, but if a guest paid a surprise visit when the sofa was covered, I wouldn't mind. Note that the cover is not waterproof. Recommended. Update: We purchased a waterproof pad that is slightly longer and wider than the cushion area of our sofa. We placed the pad beneath the throw to provide protection from our elderly parents and our dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Kimber

customer_reviews.title: Great couch cover, soft and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sofa cover! Mine is very light cream color. It is soft and cozy, easy to put on my leather couch. My dog is a large, feisty Great Pyrenees puppy who does shift the cover constantly---I knew he would before I bought this. I read other reviews saying this was tough to clean......NOT. I wash this often (paws, you know), and it only takes one spin in the dryer as well. I recommend this couch cover!
customer_reviews.author: Julie P.

customer_reviews.title: Soft and beautiful ivory cover! Really nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new ivory sofa that I am still waiting on. My teens are big and like to sleep on my sofa, so I bought this in advance to check it out. The ivory color is beautiful!! It is so sofa and comfortable. We have not spilled on it yet. The purpose will be to place on my sofa when My teens come home from college and sleep on it. It has to be fixed after each use. Would love to try in my leather sofa. I really like it and it serves its purpose , for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my brand new sofa a the day before I left town for 10 days. When I came home it was exactly in it's place. it is pretty comfortable and protects the sofa so well! I have two cats (one is about 20lbs) and they have not moved it around at all and haven't attempted to go underneath it and scratch the arms of the couch. they love sleeping on it and it's very easy to take it off when guests come over and VOILA you have a pet fur free sofa!! Not sure how it works with dogs but I LOVE it with my two long haired cats. Worth the money for sure!
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: Have dogs?  You definitely will appreciate this cover.
customer_reviews.text: With two dogs that love my couch - I tried to train these dogs like I trained my German Shepherds, not to get on my furniture, they always end up on my couch. This cover is incredible at keeping the couch clean and paw free. I only wish I had bought two - one to use and one in the laundry - yes it fits into my household, regular sized washing machine and I have it on my long 3 - 4 seater. For some reason they leave my two seater love seat alone!
customer_reviews.author: ScubaNurse

customer_reviews.title: Sure Fit Deluxe Sofa throw
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 pets and new furniture. I needed something that would cover most of the sofa. I contacted Sure Fit and they told me this would not fit the length of my sofa (87"). But I checked 3 other sources and all said it would fit. And it does. It's comfortable and easy to wash, but those of you who have pets that drag in lots of mud, etc, might want to consider the darker shade. I've had these for a year and a half and I'll go back to the comment I made about the light colored fabric. I can wipe paw prints off with a damp rag so I'm happy with the light color.
customer_reviews.author: maple leaves

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING
customer_reviews.text: I just received my SureFit Deluxe Sofa Furniture Cover with arms, in Ivory. This is my second Surefit purchase. I ordered the sofa cover to go with my SureFit Deluxe Chair cover. These covers are so cozy and soft! They cover my furniture beautifully. They also wash wonderfully. Can't safe enough good things. My two puppies nestle in and fall right asleep on them. I usually never write a comment, however this product deserves it.
customer_reviews.author: SAMH Smile

customer_reviews.title: GREAT! but not at all water proof.
customer_reviews.text: Great, super soft, washes very nicely, little if any shrinkage, but not at ALL water proof. I didnt expect it to be, but you might think it would at least soak up SOME liquid, but when my three year old had an accident on the couch, the liquid immediately soaked RIGHT through onto the couch. So if youre looking for waterproof this aint it. We eventually put a twin sized vinyl mattress cover on top of the cushions under the slipcover and now i think the couch will survive through potty training.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin E. Lang

customer_reviews.title: This is a great pet cover.  They are well made and feel luxurious.
customer_reviews.text: My 40lb dog sits on the top of our sofa, like a cat, so I was happy that these covers are cut with lots of fabric that drapes over the back to protect the top of the cushions. Also, the way these covers are cut, there is plenty of fabric to tuck in-between back and side cushions, so the covers stay in place well. Plus, my dog seems to like the soft fabric, and has even begun to take his naps on the seat cushions rather than balancing on the top of the sofa as before:-)
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Joyce  Koenig

customer_reviews.title: Looks Beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this brand before, so I knew pretty much what I was getting. With these slipcovers, you can change your look for the seasons. The fabric for this one is cool to the touch, so it's comfortable to sit on. And I think the color is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: CNH

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I've seen some negative reviews, but I bought this anyway. And I'm glad. It's working out great. The back and sides are plenty long for my sofa, which is of average size. The fabric clings to my sofa, so it only needs rearranging every couple days, instead of several times every day. I bought the ivory since it was considerably less expensive, but it works great so next time I will get the darker one which is more expensive, but matches my sofa. Even though this is very light color, dirt from my dog ( and husband) doesn't show up much. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. HULLINGS-DYSON

customer_reviews.title: Doing it's job.
customer_reviews.text: We are pretty happy with this. I can only compare it to the Sure Fit Furniture Friend I just got. This "deluxe" version is far better as it stays on and has enough material to cover the arms well. I haven't tried the covers that have straps and non-slip grip pads so I can't compare this to those types. If anyone has compared this to other types, please leave that in the comments as I would be happy to know if there is something better. If this lasts me a couple years, I will be happy with the price and will bump it up to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: DRBSantosTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: exceeds expectations/not just a pet throw
customer_reviews.text: I spent time searching and reviewing pet throws finding most stating quality lacking and not large enough. I have a standard sized couch (appr 74" long) and this throw is large enough (and would fit something larger too). The throw is thick enough and feels wonderful when you sit on it. It has a nice feel and could be used for households without pets but with children. It looks great, it feels great! It also washes great. Can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This item is great! It has great coverage and is exactly as the listing describes! I got the sofa size and it fits perfectly. When the dog s have lain on it for awhile, I can take it off and wash it, and pop it back on with little fuss. Glad I ordered it! Worth the money.Seems well made.We'll see how it holds up after 2 large dogs lounge on it for awhile!!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine C.

customer_reviews.title: Fits and easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. It feels very nice , fits the couch nicely and is easy to take off and wash. I bought it because I have a dog who likes to sleep on the couch and slober on the couch. With this i can easily remove it , wash it and it is good as new. Also is quite comfortable and adds a tiny bit of padding to the couch. I have a roughly 7 foot couch and it is a good fit. I also like the color which a cream color not a straight white.
customer_reviews.author: cheyenne guillois

customer_reviews.title: More than met my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Earlier last year I bought a Sure Fit Deluxe throw,only it was less width and depth and the material seemed not to be as good. This new larger product has better quality, feels good to the touch--but I haven't washed it yet. My expectation is that it will machine wash well. I liked it so much, I immediately ordered another.
customer_reviews.author: BZG

customer_reviews.title: So Glad I Bought This One
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a brand new sofa for the family room. With one dog and a 5 year in our home, I didn't want the new sofa to be ruined at the end of the first month. This cover is so soft and fits great. I haven't washed it yet, but I can't see it would be any problem. Several of my friends want to get this exact same cover for their sofas. It's worth the money. Love the ivory color.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Willis

customer_reviews.title: 2 Years +  Still comes out of the wash like new!
customer_reviews.text: One very active yellow lab owns the couch in question, this thing gets washed about once a week. I have the ivory colored one, just barley fits in a full size washing machine. Wash it on the long soak cycle with a double dose of detergent and a cup of bleach. Comes out like new, no smell, no stains, perfect! I still don't see any loose stitching or other signs of wear & tear, although it may be lighter in color from when I got it from the bleach. I can't tell unless I get a new one, and I'm thinking about it only for the second couch, not because the one I have is worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Franco R

customer_reviews.title: Sure Fit Deluxe Pet Sofa Slipcover
customer_reviews.text: Superior product! I wish I'd known about something like this before. For two years now I've been using four separate blankets to protect my ivory colored couch from my beloved dog. This never worked for me as I'd be pulling up the blankets and adjusting them at least twice a day. The Sure Fit Slipcover has eliminated the need to do this, it stays in place so perfectly. I love this slipcover, and I must say it is a very attractive and well-made slipcover of quality construction and materials. I'm happy, the doggie's happy, it's all good!
customer_reviews.author: B Smith

customer_reviews.title: A real couch saver!
customer_reviews.text: This really fit the bill. I have a large leather couch with 2 medium sized 1 yr old pups. I took the advice of one customer and ordered some sheet clips to keep it from sliding off. My pups and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sure Fit Deluxe Pet Sofa Slipcover - Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect pet sofa slipcover and it fits and stays! I read a lot of reviews on all different types of covers, and after reading about this one, I felt it would work out the best. It costs more, yet that is what I am paying for, a product that is exactly what it says, "Sure Fit Deluxe Pet For Sofa Slipcover, and the color Ivory is perfect!" I highly recommend this product, very happy with it and it looks very fantastic while it is doing it's job! Suzi F.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi F.

customer_reviews.title: I love this throw
customer_reviews.text: My son went away on business for three months and asked if I would watch his dog. I have all white furniture and that was a concern. I love this throw. I have washed it numerous times in cold water and air dried. It dries in a couple of hours and still looks like new. Nice long back keeps it in place well.
customer_reviews.author: HGra

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this cover for about a week. So far, so good. Love the soft material. It stays in place pretty well. I bought a matching one for my loveseat and am overall very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Conright

customer_reviews.title: Fits great; looks good
customer_reviews.text: This fits my couch perfectly and looks very nice. I ordered the off-white which looks great-but if I could order it again, I would not get off-white because I have a beagle, so his dog hair really shows and I have to wash it all the time. It keeps my couch protected and does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Elo

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this type I returned the ivory and kept the burgundy and I am very pleased with the material - so soft to touch. It is oversized in back for good fit and stays in place very well. Still straighten a little but I am perfectionist. I highly recommend this type the color is personal preference. Easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Harwell

customer_reviews.title: Fit great, look nice and are very soft
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to the reviews from others, I gave these covers a try for my new 88" sofas. They fit great and are very soft and comfortable. I trust they will wash up as nicely as other reviewers stated, so all in all I am very pleased. They come off quickly when company comes which is also a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Long Time Customer

customer_reviews.title: fit well and good protection
customer_reviews.text: fit well on our sofa and offers ample protection from our dog and her dirty pays.
customer_reviews.author: CarlS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, soft, doesn't hang on to animal fur, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Bergmark

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage though
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an Italian leather set, and it slips around alot. Good coverage though. I just tuck it in, although, it untucks everytime some one sits on it. It was purchased to proctect the furniture from the beagle and cat! It does that!
customer_reviews.author: LA1960

customer_reviews.title: Old Dog and New Sofa
customer_reviews.text: We were worried about the old dog and the new sofa....and the tacky throw covers that I did not want to look at. This cover stays relatively in place and while it isn't ugly, it could be a bit berger...it's a bit too white for me. But it's well made and a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Womanista

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This cover is so soft and pretty that I actually like to just leave it on the sofa all the time! It washes BEAUTIFULLY!!!!! Expensive at $100, but my new sofa cost $1700 and we have dogs and cats, so a great price for protecting the new upholstery.
customer_reviews.author: Ghannoushi

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cover that would bring new life to my den furniture. This cover worked wonders. I also have it in my living room in the tan color.Yes, you do have to make adjustments once in a while but thats not a big problem. Saved alot by not buying new furniture. Looks good and gave new life to the rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great to protect sofa from cat fur!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something easy to take off our sofa when we have company. This cover looks nice, is soft, our cat loves it and it takes seconds to remove when company comes. Easy to put back on too. Looks better than the floppy covers we've had which never seem to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Buffalo lady

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is too big for my sofa but I still like it. I does everything it was advertised to do. Easy to wash in machine. Does not wrinkle. The one I got for the chair works just as good. Wish I could have gotten this in darker color.
customer_reviews.author: Wizard348

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and protects my couch
customer_reviews.text: This cover looks great and it still looks great after several washings. I got it because my cat likes to cough up hairballs on my new couch. It is not water-proof, but it is thick enough that moisture does not penetrate it (so far).
customer_reviews.author: JoEllen

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Was very unhappy with the product. The measurements provided were so off. Didn't even come close to fitting my couch. The quick and easy instructions were a load of crap. Pieces that were supposed to be labeled weren't. When I went to company website for help, none of videos can be watched on a iPhone and for someone without a computer this is very frustrating. And they don't even have videos for this product. The only way to contact them is by phone or by fax. Will never buy another "Surefit" product again.
customer_reviews.author: Desire Aguiar

customer_reviews.title: Nice pet throw.
customer_reviews.text: This throw works very well. I have a cat and a dog that love to lay and sit on the top of the couch. I've had this for a couple months now, it has held up great and goes through the washer and dryer really well. You do have to adjust it after sitting on it.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: After years of having blankets, sheets, etc on my furniture, this is a great find. It requires minimal adjustment and holds up well. Wish I had found this years ago, although it took me several weeks to receive the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Beattie

customer_reviews.title: Seriously best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough good things about this cover. I'd been looking for a sofa cover that would stay in place forever. This is it. And it looks great and is machine washable. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: DRL11

customer_reviews.title: it is now the favorite resting and sleeping place for my cat
customer_reviews.text: I have seen many of these pet covers which were not worth taking out of the box. They were skimpy and ugly. This one is definetly an exception. It is plush and large enough to cover and tuck in for stay power. It not only covers my couch well, it is now the favorite resting and sleeping place for my cat, keeping the other furniture hair-free.
customer_reviews.author: Emma L Brent

customer_reviews.title: Cozy Cover
customer_reviews.text: Really nice fabric. Fits nicely, great purchase. Made our couch more comfy, looks great. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: They are still beautiful and wash well
customer_reviews.text: We have had these covers for 3 years! They are still beautiful and wash well. Our dog is rough on them but they do the job!
customer_reviews.author: MiMi P.

customer_reviews.title: The fabric is very nice, but always comes out of couch
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is very nice, but always comes out of couch, will have to order those special plastic things
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dirty !
customer_reviews.text: Just received it and RETURNING IT! It came dirty,stained!!Really Dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: Albana A

customer_reviews.title: Great cover!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is well made. I've washed it several times and it still looks great. It's a generous size. I bought it for our new leather sofa. You have to adjust it quite a bit but it does what we bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: C Jobe

customer_reviews.title: This cover is nice and thick
customer_reviews.text: This cover is nice and thick. It stays on better than the thinner covers but the back and arms are a bit short on overstuffed sofas. It looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: kjones9820

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price, thank you.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these and they fit well, require minor adjusting daily (we have 4 kids and 2 dogs).
customer_reviews.author: Nathan and Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this slipcover after purchasing several others that I was unhappy with. This cover is thick and super soft. It fits my couch well and provides excellent coverage. The ivory color is beautiful. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni1028

customer_reviews.title: ... got two of these on sale and they look great in our living room covering up our faux leather ...
customer_reviews.text: We got two of these on sale and they look great in our living room covering up our faux leather couches...to protect it from our cute, ferocious cat.
customer_reviews.author: A25

customer_reviews.title: Sofa cover
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted this to work but it was too tight on my sofa. Had to return. Material feels nice. Would buy again if I thought it would fit.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Waited to review this item until I washed it several times. Still like brand new. Would not recommend for leather sofas, but other than that this a nice looking sofa cover. Very, very soft too.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea C.

customer_reviews.title: Sofa Pet Throw
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it five stars if it didn't come stained in the package. I washed it and it came right out. The throw washes well and the color did not change.
customer_reviews.author: Sheshe

customer_reviews.title: These really work
customer_reviews.text: These pet throws are great. They are beautiful and wash really well. The throws are a very plush material so they look nice and best of all they wash well and hold up to pet accidents.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene S

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.  Kitties love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice, durable fabric that washes up great. A slight drawback is that you have to straighten it often, but I expected that. My only complaint is that there is quite a bit of fabric that falls over the back of the sofa. I would think that could be cut back a bit to save material (and money).
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Geer

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep our sofa protected from our dog, It ...
customer_reviews.text: Helps keep our sofa protected from our dog, It slides around a bit due to having a leather couch, but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Urban

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice material but it doesn't stay on the furniture very well. I've resorted to sheets and blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi C.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT - MY DOGS LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Very cushy - washes up well (important when you have dogs). I am planning to order a second cover so that we have one to wash/repair and one for the couch to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ride to the Music

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this slipcover
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color! Easy to apply and looks great! The fabric is not as heavy as I would like however it is more than adequate to provide the protection I want.
customer_reviews.author: cpwp

customer_reviews.title: Do you want compliments?
customer_reviews.text: This slip cover is absolutely beautiful. Such a rich looking burgundy. Hard to fine a true burgundy color, without having red tones. If you want a true burgundy slip cover, his is the one to buy. I also purchased the brown one, and it is also very pretty. Fairly easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: CityGirl

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic cover. Washes really well. I wash it and hang dry and it looks brand new after using it a year.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen white

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you have animals that love to get up on your couch....this is a must! Love it~ thank you
customer_reviews.author: Pauline A. Brendle

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product. Great for protecting furniture from pets claws ...
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived in a reasonable time. Wonderful product. Great for protecting furniture from pets claws and fur.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Webre

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, nice thickness, soft and comfortable and easy to clean up pet hair with a hand vac.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good sturdy cover for your couch
customer_reviews.text: This cover is nice enough to use in my formal living room. It is soft and mostly stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Imelda G

customer_reviews.title: Surefit covers
customer_reviews.text: We are presently using this product and are very pleased with the quality of the product, it price and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Ibarra

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I really searched long and hard before purchasing this pet cover. Very happy with the quality and fit of this product, I have a small sofa and had to do a little tucking but it looks great and is the same color as my sofa, very nice. It would probably be to small if you have a very large sofa. I called Sure Fit first to check the actual measurements before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: The cover look nice and it does what I wanted it to do. I would recommend this to anyone looking for using it for the same purpose.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Saved my sofa
customer_reviews.text: Well worth it! Saved my sofa from hairballs on more than one occasion. Wish it had some layer inside that was less permeable to fluids.
customer_reviews.author: DALE F SHELTON

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this sofa pet throw..it looks great and it does not slip! I wish I had found this sooner
customer_reviews.author: CuriousJohnny

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: First ever slipcover that stays in place with our 90 pound dog. Offers excellent protection and coverage. Well made and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Cgullett

customer_reviews.title: Saved my couch!
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to make our "kids" stay on the floor when we want to cuddle with them too. I got the ivory one....thought it would be more of a beige...& when my muddy footed dog left paw prints on it, I waited till they dried, & patted the mud off with my hand! I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Moorman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: THIS COVER MAKES MY SOFA LOOKS LIKE NEW I HIGHLY RECOMEND IT.
customer_reviews.author: ALFREDO

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 and they fit both my sofas perfectly...the color matches the curtain that I also ordered,
customer_reviews.author: Aquarius1957

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking throw, but not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, but it's not waterproof. Good for pet fur.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: As described, easy to put on, does need adjusting frequently
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Jo Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Sofa Slipcover
customer_reviews.text: I like the material. The biggest drawback was that it was shipped from outside Amazon and it took over a month to get it. It washes and dries well. I just wish it would cover a little more of the front of the couch.
customer_reviews.author: David Hammon

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for my sofa
customer_reviews.text: Great protection for my sofa. I have dogs, cats, and grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: Donna G. W.

customer_reviews.title: Got it before the recent price increase and
customer_reviews.text: it was one of the least expensive ones I found that met my criteria.. long back to over back of couch to help prevent slippage.. long front flap to protect front of couch. And decent size arm protectors. Washes up very nicely, doesn't slip - two dogs use the couch along with 2 adults..the material is nice, soft but sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: SandraJ

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its a little too long for our sofa but should protect from cat and toddler peeing
customer_reviews.author: Ms. A

customer_reviews.title: Not for leather sofas
customer_reviews.text: Soft and plush, but does not work well with leather couches as it slips all over the place. Probably nice for fabric sofas.
customer_reviews.author: A. Knight

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this cover. Fit my couch great, protection coverage is great, and quality is exceptional! Would purchase these again if ever needed!
customer_reviews.author: Lindysgirl

customer_reviews.title: I do feel like I have to straighten it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I do feel like I have to straighten it a lot! Aside from that great product. Just wish it would stay in place
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: This is harder than hell to figure out how to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is harder than hell to figure out how to get it on, then almost impossible for one person alone to accomplish. Sit on it a couple times and have to redo it . . . over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Michel Limbocker

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stay on the couch well, wrinkles if anyone tries to actually use the couch.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Very nice covers, but when large people plop on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice covers, but when large people plop on the couches the back is always coming up and needs constant readjusting.
customer_reviews.author: Kn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cover
customer_reviews.text: We bought this cover to protect our new couch from our dog. We bought two and it seems like one is shorter than the other one but it's perfect cover for what we need thus the 5 stars/
customer_reviews.author: Tinkerbell

customer_reviews.title: Fit and stay with my sofa
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits my sofa perfectly. The cover stays in its place with my dog on it all the time. After washing, it stays as the original shape and color. Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Li

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to cover a brand new sofa at our rental home, and we're glad we did. It's already been tested and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey L.

customer_reviews.title: Yup, worth it...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is genius! Sure, it moves around a bit, but it feels like heaven, protects the couch, and washes really well. I love this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Whitleigh84

customer_reviews.title: good fit for a sofa in a bright room
customer_reviews.text: This fit my old sofa pretty well. I replaced my previous cover with this and it gave the sofa a new look. Definitely beats spending extra money to buy a new sofa just cause your old one looks...well, old!
customer_reviews.author: Ashwin Periagaram

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with the pet throw. It will keep the couch clean when our yorkie jumps up after being outside. It's very soft and comfy and fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: it was nice but it did not fit at all
customer_reviews.text: it was nice but it did not fit at all. either i ordered the wrong size or the wrong one was sent.
customer_reviews.author: jjipsy

customer_reviews.title: Great covers
customer_reviews.text: This cover is great! It is washable, comfortable and looks very elegant on the couches. We have a large dog so it really protects our leather couches when we are not home. The only trouble we have is that it slips off the back of the leather couches . For us its a minor problem since we only use the covers when we are not home and it still protects the sitting cushions which is why we bought this product. We have gotten numerous compliments on them since most of our friends are dog owners and use random blankets to cover their couches.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS CURRAN

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I received it on time. And it fits my couch great. It's soft and comfortable. I'd recommend it if you have inside pets.
customer_reviews.author: CHERYL

customer_reviews.title: Great Pet slipcover
customer_reviews.text: My herd of cats LOVE this slipcover just as much as I do. It's looks great, and when I have company, it's easily removeable.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. I would order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Smith

customer_reviews.title: Pefect for my funiture
customer_reviews.text: I purchased all three sizes for my overstuffed furniture. They fit great and stay on very well even with my two large dogs playing on them. They also wash well and come out of the dryer like the day I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Roger A. Kuhl II

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my sofa, stays in place and easy to clean car hair off using a vacuum attachment.
customer_reviews.author: MilesOfTexas

customer_reviews.title: Finally a cover long enough.
customer_reviews.text: The cover is long enough and also covers the sofa back as well. It stays in place and protects the arms nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Tom J

product_meta.title: Surefit Home Décor Deluxe Microban Protective Finish One Piece Sofa Furniture Cover, Quilted Velvet Polyester, Machine Washable, Ivory
product_meta.description: Style Name:Box Cushion| Color:IvorySure Fit Home Décor Deluxe Velvet with Microban Protective Finish One Piece Sofa Furniture Cover, Quilted Velvet Polyester, Machine Washable. Perfect for family rooms and casual decorative styles, our luxuriously plush quilted velvet Deluxe Furniture Cover is a stylish solution that protects your furniture from pet hair, stains and wear. Filled with high-loft polyester batting for ultimate comfort, it features a microfiber fabric backing and an extra-long 50-inch backdrop to prevent slippage. A special Microban protective finish resists odors for lasting freshness between washing. Body width 76" x 84" overall depth. Made with 100% polyester. Machine wash in cold water and tumble dry. Do not use bleach. Do not iron.
feature_bullets: FURNITURE COVER: Perfect for family rooms and casual decorative styles, our luxuriously plush quilted velvet Deluxe Furniture Cover is a stylish solution that protects your furniture from pet hair, stains and wear. Filled with high-loft polyester batting for ultimate comfort, it features a microfiber fabric backing and an extra-long 50-inch backdrop to prevent slippage. A special Sanitized-Actifresh protective finish resists odors for lasting freshness between washing.
SPECIAL FEATURE: Microban protective finish resists odors for lasting freshness between washings
EASY MAINTENANCE: Machine wash in cold water and tumble dry. Do not use bleach. Do not iron.
SIZE: Body width 76" x 84" Overall depth
